title: Various-Eye for android
description: This model of watch has its hour, minute, and second hands in a fluid, clockwise motion. At every moment,  its hour, minute,  and second can be magnified. Reminding it's users that time is like passing  water, and that moments in life need to be felt and more cherished.Feature✔ Date✔ Analog Time✔ Resolution:320*320✔ Round & Square Watch Face✔ Concise & Power savingCOMPATIBLE WITH Moto 360 ( moto360 )Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )Huawei WatchLG G Watch R ( lgwr )LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )Samsung Gear LiveAsus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )How to use1. Once you install the app, the watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. (may take a few minutes)2. From watch: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.From mobile: Run the “Android Wear” app and tap “More” button in the watchface sectionNoteIf you have some suggestion,you can reach us:Email:acornsstudio@gmail.comFacebook:https://www.facebook.com/groups/1676804045872482Google+:https://plus.google.com/106543864725528267317
descriptionHTML:
This model of watch has its hour, minute, and second hands in a fluid, clockwise motion. At every moment, its hour, minute, and second can be magnified. Reminding it's users that time is like passing water, and that moments in life need to be felt and more cherished.
Feature
✔ Date
✔ Analog Time
✔ Resolution:320*320
✔ Round & Square Watch Face
✔ Concise & Power saving

COMPATIBLE WITH
Moto 360 ( moto360 )
Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )
Huawei Watch
LG G Watch R ( lgwr )
LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )
LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )
Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )
Samsung Gear Live
Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )

How to use
1. Once you install the app, the watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. (may take a few minutes)
2. From watch: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the “Android Wear” app and tap “More” button in the watchface section

Note
If you have some suggestion,you can reach us:
Email:acornsstudio@gmail.com
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/groups/1676804045872482
Google+:https://plus.google.com/106543864725528267317
comments: Watch Face Too Small The watchface is an interesting design, but it's too small to be usable.
Used this for a long time and I am now returning because I missed it
Slow It is a good idea but the seconds hand felt choppy and in appealing, really fuzzy as well on the background when inactive. Just didn't look good during use.
